Name: optofMRI_DRN
Acknowledgements: We thank Dr. Koji Toda for his comments on awake optogenetic stimulation, Dr. Katsuhiko Miyazaki for his comments on protocol of optogenetic stimulation, Dr. Keigo Hikishima for his comments on fMRI, and Mr. Yoshiaki Ohba for creation of acclimation tools. We thank Dr. Jiafu Zeng for animal support for MRI acquisition. We also acknowledge Prof. Grandjean for his support in replicating results from a CBV fMRI dataset.

GeneratedBy.Name: ezBIDS
GeneratedBy.Description: ezBIDS is a web-based tool for converting neuroimaging datasets to BIDS, requiring neither coding nor knowledge of the BIDS specification
